remarks: A nonzero member of a subspace doesn't belong to the orthocomplement of the subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dochnoncon.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochnoncon.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochnoncon.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dochnoncon.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochnoncon.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochnel2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochnel2.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
dochnel2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( T \ { .0. } ) ) $.
dochnel2 $p |- ( ph -> -. X e. ( ._|_ ` T ) ) $.
